name: Two Words Into One Will Go - Part 3 Trivia Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Male chicken - and - hole in the ground.

(Don't forget to read the hints)
Device for operating locks - and - a supervisory committee.
Serious situation - and - unit of measured length.
Stiff paper - and - razor-like cutting edge.
Uppermost part of human body  - and -  One fourth divisions of the whole.
The non-spatial continuum in which events occur - and - furniture with flat surface supported on legs.
Area farthest from the front - and - a thigh cut of bacon.
Churned milk or cream  - and -  drinking container with a handle.
questions.explanation:
buttercup.

	Butter + cup Definitions referenced to Dictionary.com
